set.commands:
PACKAGE_NAME=libgnurx PACKAGE_VERSION=0.12
oegextract regex-0.12.tar.gz configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} # only few parameters #make regex.o
gcc -DSTDC_HEADERS -DHAVE_STRING_H=1 -I/mingw/include -I. -c regex.c ar ru libregex.a regex.o cp libregex.a ${OEG_BASE_DIR}/lib cp regex.h ${OEG_BASE_DIR}/include/
